migrations.description: Remove deprecated options from webpack-server and webpack-browser.
migrations.name: update-angular-config

migrations.description: Remove enableIvy and add compilationMode to library tsconfig and remove deprecated ng-packagr options.
migrations.name: update-libraries

migrations.description: Update jest config to support jest-preset-angular
migrations.name: update-angular-jest-config

migrations.description: Move some imports from @nrwl/angular/testing to jasmine-marbles
migrations.name: update-testing-imports

migrations.description: Remove no longer valid Angular schematic options from `angular.json`.
migrations.name: schematic-options-13

migrations.description: Remove deprecated options from 'angular.json' that are no longer present in v13.
migrations.name: update-angular-config-v13

migrations.description: Update library projects to be published in partial mode and removed deprecated options from ng-packagr configuration.
migrations.name: update-libraries-v13

migrations.description: Remove polyfills required only for Internet Explorer which is no longer supported.
migrations.name: drop-ie-polyfills

migrations.description: Migrates `[routerLink]=""` in templates to `[routerLink]="[]"` because these links are likely intended to route to the current page with updated fragment/query params.
migrations.name: migration-v13-router-link-empty-expression

migrations.description: In Angular version 13, the `teardown` flag in `TestBed` will be enabled by default. This migration automatically opts out existing apps from the new teardown behavior.
migrations.name: migration-v13-testbed-teardown

migrations.description: Updates the Angular CDK to v13
migrations.name: migration-v13
